name: Fellow Flaps
description:
It starts in between 2-2:30 AM. There will be sounds coming and player wakes up and sees around the room and walk towards to window and he see’s a burning buildings outside he comes out of his house
There will be two direction in which one direction aliens will be coming he goes to another direction 
He finds different creature which if flying(helping creature) it introduces itself and say what’s happening and what player should do.
Player starts moving another direction where he see’s different aliens he over comes the all aliens by listening to flying creature.
He over comes aliens by stealth mode, attacking and defending
At last one he kills last alien 
Screen splashes and he wakes up as it was dream and helping creature is pet bird.
-the end-
